abstract: The former chairman of Sinopec, the largest oil refiner in Asia, was convicted of corruption by a court in Beijing on Wednesday, according to the Chinese news agency Xinhua.
snippet: The former chairman of Sinopec, the largest oil refiner in Asia, was convicted of corruption by a court in Beijing on Wednesday, according to the Chinese news agency Xinhua.
lead_paragraph: The former chairman of Sinopec, the largest oil refiner in Asia, was convicted of corruption by a court in Beijing on Wednesday, according to the Chinese news agency Xinhua.

headline.main: Beijing Court Convicts Ex-Sinopec Chief of Bribery
